history.narrative: Law 2-132 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-258, which was referred to the Committee on Education, Recreation and Youth Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 25, 1978, and September 19, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 13, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-279 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
